enable.label: Enabled
enable.help: Turn this option to actually include the tracking code.

proxy_domain.label: Proxy domain
proxy_domain.help: Where to serve the JS code from. Leave it blank to use plausible.io. This allows to prevent adblockers from removing the tracking code. Check the Plausible docs.

exclude_admin.label: Exclude admin
exclude_admin.help: Will prevent views from admins to count towards the tracking if logged in.
